headline.main: MORE BRITONS JOIN IN SIEGE OF CHEREN; Column That Invaded Eritrea From North Meets Italians in Outlying Positions UNITS TO WEST ADVANCE Entire Fascist-Division is Said to Have Been Shattered in the Somaliland Battle

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Feb. 28 -- The British column that drove down from the north to join the siege of Cheren, Eritrea, was officially reported today to have made contact with the Italian forces holding outlying positions north of the town. The British forces west of Cheren drove forward and bettered their positions.
abstract: more Brit join Cheren, Eritrea, siege
